SELECT ID ,VINNO ,MANAGE_NO ,SERVICE_DEGREE ,CONSULTING_DEGREE ,CONSULTING_NM ,CONSULTING_TYPE ,CHECK_CONT ,CONSULTING_CONT ,CONSULTING_RESULT ,AUTOINSERT ,CONSULTING_DATE ,AUDIT_INFO ,SD_APPOINT ,RGSTR_ID ,RGST_DT ,UPDTR_ID ,UPDT_DT ,TRAN_YN ,(SELECT OFFICE_CITY FROM TB_BA_OFFICE_MASTER WHERE OFFICE_CD = A.SD_APPOINT AND ROWNUM = 1) AS OFFICE_CITY ,(SELECT FST_NM FROM TB_CM_USER WHERE ACCT_ID = A.CONSULTING_NM ) AS RECEIVE_USER
FROM TB_DC_CONSULTING A
